website_summaries.verdict: Given the longevity of the Puma King soccer cleats on the market, the release of the Puma King Pro Soft Ground proved to be a good move from the German brand. It did not leave the majority of users disappointed when it comes to comfort, fit, and durability. By retaining its classic look, this soccer cleat is the perfect combination of vintage elegance and modern innovation.
pros: The majority of buyers were delighted by the fact that Puma King Pro Soft Ground is relatively more affordable than the original Puma King soccer cleats
This soccer cleat provides a great fit for players with wide foot, as stated in some reviews
Many players mentioned that the Puma King Pro SG felt comfortable right out of the box
Several users were impressed by the durability of this soccer cleat, with some having had theirs for a few months to a couple of years
One person said that the cleat fits like a glove
cons: A couple of players noticed that the Puma King Pro Soft Ground is a half size smaller than their usual size
One individual complained of having blisters on his feet caused by the studs pushing through the soleplate

customer_reviews.title: Lovely boots, but far too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I have played for several years in Puma boots, normally “Puma One” or their yearly update. I went for these as a second boot option for when the ground cuts up mid winter. They look great and we’re high quality. I’m am a size 11 across all my Puma boots, but these were far too tight. I have quite broad feet, but even so they were so narrow I couldn’t get my foot in. Don’t assume because you use other Puma that these will fit. If your feet are narrow, game on!
customer_reviews.author: S&L

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: I could not put my foot in the boot with ease, it was a fundamental task to ease my foot with a shoehorn into the boot, far to tight. Its a shame because the quality of the boot was lovely.
customer_reviews.author: B P TOWNER

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, just be careful if have wider feet
customer_reviews.text: A bit norrow. Need a lot of breaking in if you have wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son in law thinks they're great fit well and comfy too
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I really love the product, is well look nd quality it makes me comfortable when I'm in the feed of play, it makes soccer easy 💪💪💪
customer_reviews.author: Osas

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and it is light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and i use it to play football myself.
customer_reviews.author: Steve.Njie

customer_reviews.title: Fit and boot performance in wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant product at a great price during amazon deal week. Arrived in perfect condition and the size was the exact one in the description. The boot itself was slightly tighter than expected on the first wear but this is usually expected in a New pair of boots. After a little bit of running around in then the leather started to mould to my foot shape making them very comfortable. Studs are a fantastic length for wintery conditions and proved very useful at preventing slips. Very happy with the product and would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I will get my money returned that you took when I ordered the boots.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get my foot inside the boot as it was to small. Even though I ordered a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: B P TOWNER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, comfortable, good material and feel safe in them when I play
customer_reviews.author: mike j.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfy
customer_reviews.text: The back of the boots is very hard and kept rubbing my heels and gave me 2 bad blisters on both heels! I found the front of the boot was very tight and narrow they was very quiet uncomfy wearing them I have to take them off and change my boots 30 minutes into the game!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today in a non descript white shoe box and the stud tightener was missing. The metal studs were not pristine clean. At least maybe a return , at worst maybe counterfeit?
customer_reviews.author: robert mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Puma King Football boots Junior Size 6
customer_reviews.text: I disliked nothing about product, and we use the boots for football.
customer_reviews.author: graham pikesley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time great service and good quality football boots
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Elasticated tongue of Shoe Extremely tight even after ordering larger sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KINGS ARE BACK
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, the k Leather is really soft, I recommend going half a size up as they are narrowish but I have got wide feet. An old classic with a modern twist, GREAT BOOTS AT A GREAT PRICE👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jason Holdsworth

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's King PRO SG Football Shoe
product_meta.description: With its industrial-inspired design, the PUMA Axis was long overdue for a comeback, and underneath the shoe’s armour lies a treasure trove of soft cushioning properties to keep your feet in good nick. An IMEVA midsole offers immediate support in a lightweight package, while the SoftFoam+ sockliner ensures a plush ride for your feet every time. The tough rubber outsole helps prevents slipping and sliding.
feature_bullets: Lightweight TPU outsole with conical screw-in studs
Subtle PUMA Formstrip on lateral side
